meanings.definition: To fill or imbue with a pleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: She was perfuming the room with a lovely scent.
meanings.sent2: The florist was perfuming the air with the fragrance of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally started perfuming the kitchen with too much garlic.
meanings.sent4: The morning dew perfuming the grass with a refreshing aroma.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze was perfuming the garden with the scent of blooming roses.

meanings.definition: The act of applying perfume to something.
meanings.sent1: Her perfuming of the fabric made it smell delightful.
meanings.sent2: The perfuming of the letter added a touch of elegance to it.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexpected perfuming of the couch with catnip was a surprise.
meanings.sent4: The perfuming of the room with a luxurious scent created a welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The perfuming of the gift box made the present even more special.
